title: (29400) Ronda - 66 Calle Tomilla
description: Public swimming baths, showers & toilets. Sandwiches also available .

title: (29400) Ronda - 18 Arrabal Sector Este
description: About 800m from the new bridge, ideal during the day and lonely at night. Street with very little traffic.

title: (29400) Ronda - 53 Calle Santa Cecilia
description: Water point

title: (29400) Ronda - 11 Calle Molino de Alarcón
description:
Smallish vans only no motorhomes!
five marked parking bays on narrow cobble street by hotel under the city walls of old Ronda. slight slope so probably no good for absorption fridges/coolboxes. parked all day to visit town, really pleasant walk up cobble ramps. quiet night. Stealth mode. No problems.

title: (29400) Ronda - 8 Avenida de Juan Pablo II
title_short: (29400) Ronda - 8 Avenida de Juan Pablo II
description: Parking lot along AV. Pablo Juan II

title: (29400) Ronda - 16 Calle Espalda a Calle Azucena
title_short: (29400) Ronda - 16 Calle Espalda a Calle Azucena
description: Quiet parking

title: (29400) Ronda - 62 Avenida Cruz de San Jorge
title_short: (29400) Ronda - 62 Avenida Cruz de San Jorge
description: OK place. Nothing disturbing.

title: (29400) Ronda - 9 Calle Chica
description: Excellent public and secure car park to visit Ronda. No height restriction. The bridge and old town can be reached on foot in about 10 minutes. Cost: 0.80 euros / hour

title: (29400) Ronda - 27 Carretera de los Molinos
description:
Small more or less flat land below a small road.
Perfect day or night, for 3 or 4 vans or small motorhomes.
Absolute calm and view of the upper town and the very pleasant surrounding countryside.

title: (29400) Ronda - 14 Calle Doctor Carrillo Guerrero
description: Optimal for large vehicles, the bus station across the street five minutes away. Not very suggestive for the night (busy street).

title: (29400) Ronda - Carretera de los Molinos
description: Pretty flat spot right in the turn. Space for two vans <8m, no service.

title: (29400) Ronda - 15 Calle Córdoba
description: Quiet street where you can spend the night, with trees that provide shade, 10 minutes from the center on foot.

title: (29400) Ronda - 11 Calle Comandante Salvador Carrasco
description: Laundry Eco Lavanderia Ronda. 10-20kg washing Machines, 20kg dryers. We found everything clean and tidy. washing detergent is included.

title: (29400) Ronda - 1955 Carretera de los Molinos
description: Mini-parking with views of the Ronda bridge, a few dozen meters above the parking lot of the hostel. The ground is not flat and would not be suitable for pernocting, but it is ideal for a picnic with a view!

title: (29400) Ronda - 31 Avenida Andalucía
description: This is the parking lot of the station. There is no service, but it is 10 minutes from the center. Enough level and for us free. Because the payment method does not work, so there are no barriers.

title: (29400) Ronda - s/n Calle Guadalcobacin
description: Local pool. And there is also the option of shower, this allows you access to changing rooms, toilets and electricity point for hair dryer etc. (there they do not have). Clean and comfortable facilities. Outdoor parking right in front. Supermarket a few meters away and a 24-hour laundry a few streets below.

title: (29400) Ronda - 4 Calle Guadalcobacin
description: Sports equipment area 15 minutes walk from Puente Nuevo. Plaza with ping-pong tables and water jets.

title: (29400) Ronda - 10 Partida los Morales
description: Parking without service, without shade, shops nearby (Mercado Bar, restaurant, Bazaar), very quiet night. Easy for large camper, 1km 700m from the center. Super if 2 wheels

title: (29400) Ronda - 1 Calle las Flores
description: Parking along this road. Slopping Hill. Easy access to town centre and other monuments of interest. No services.

title: (29400) Ronda - 2 Calle Santo Tomás
description: Place near the Mercadona, it is a street. Very quiet but about 20 minutes walk from the pit, bullring ... No services.

title: (29400) Ronda - 19 Calle Antonia Molina
description: Street 1km from downtown, with plenty of parking available, easy access.

title: (29400) Ronda - 3B Calle Bella Vista
description: Quiet, flat and close place to visit the city on foot (8min). It is a residential area, with more than 30 parking spaces.

title: (29400) Ronda - 60 Calle Puesta de Sol
description: Quietly located parking space next to an apartment building and nature. No facilities, but a quiet place to spend the night. About a 15 minute walk to the gorge that separates both Ronda districts.

title: (29400) Ronda - 2 Plaza Pruna
description: Next to a park with playground and picnic tables. Close to the city centre, 10 minutes from the new bridge. As everywhere in Ronda there are so-called ‘security guards’ in yellow vest knocking on the campers begging for money. It’s free parking and if everyone keeps saying no they leave.

title: (29400) Ronda - 50 Calle Cuevas del Becerro
description: Parking outwith the town centre in a residential area adjacent to the railway line. Suitable for large mohos and vans. DO NOT drive and try and park in the town centre, it is all narrow streets with cars parked everywhere and most of it is one way streets. Park on the outskirts and walk in. This is about 1km from the centre.No gorilla's in sight demanding protection money. There is a children's play park at the end of the street.

title: (29400) Ronda - 20 Calle Francisco de Goya y Lucientes
title_short: (29400) Ronda - 20 Calle Francisco de Goya y Lucientes
description:
Free parking along the road below the RV site when the site is full. Right at the stadium. Slightly sloping, no problem for cross sleepers.
30 min walk to the old town. Every Sunday market opposite on the exhibition grounds.

address.street: 20 Calle Francisco de Goya y Lucientes

title: (29400) Ronda - 6 Calle Lola Peña Parres
description: Nature Laundry, recently opened.Very close to a motorhome area, restaurants, supermarkets, playgrounds, 10 minutes walk from the center of Ronda.

title: (29400) Ronda - Carretera de Ronda
description: Free parking spaces at the exhibition center. No service, 20 minutes walk from the center. Next to the road that surrounds Ronda. Many vehicles pass. Lots of street lights all around.

title: (29400) Ronda - nº3 Calle Sor Pilar
description: Gas bottles... exchanged an Irish and a Morrocan cylinder for 2 Spanish cylinders.

name: Área Autocaravanas Ciudad de Ronda
title: (29400) Área Autocaravanas Ciudad de Ronda
description: Area located 20 minutes walk from the historic center of the city of Ronda. Ample parking space, with picnic area and dog park. Nearby is the bus stop to the center. It is located right next to the Police and Fire Department.

title: (29400) Ronda - A-6300
description: Parking El Pinsado restaurant. The owner allowed us to park at the end of the parking lot during our visit to Ronda. We went by bike, back a little steep.

title: (29400) Ronda - 43 Plaza Península Ibérica
description: Spectacular views. No services, but very quiet

title: (29400) Ronda - 20 Calle Escritora Ana Rosseti
description: Small parking lot on the edge of a park. Close to the road but little traffic. Quiet in the evening, even if a few locals take their dogs for a walk in the early evening. One of the few places to spend the night around Ronda.

title: (29400) Ronda - 16 Carretera el Burgo
description: Small amount of free parking for campers at the top of the coach / bus park. Foot bridge takes you across A367 and into town. Follow Avendia de malaga and Carrera Espinel to the Plaza de Toros, 25 min walk, there you will find tourist information with maps. We left our motorhome here for 4 hours, no problems.

title: (29400) Ronda - 661 Partida los Molinos
description: Easy access source, although it is not threaded and it is difficult to attach a hose

title: (29400) Ronda - 49 Partida los Molinos
description: Parking in nature with views of the Ronda bridge. Silent and in nature. On the way to the hermitage there are several individual parking areas.

name: Camping El Sur | Área de Autocaravanas
title: (29400) Camping El Sur | Área de Autocaravanas
title_short: (29400) Camping El Sur | Área de Autocaravanas
description: RV park of the campsite. The pitch is 2 km from the hospital and 500 m from the bus stop, restaurant and supermarket. 2 km from the historical area of Ronda (bars, restaurants, services). Petrol station 1.3 km and 2.5 km from the new bridge, symbol of Ronda. Neat, quiet place surrounded by nature.

name: Camping El Sur
title: (29400) Camping El Sur
description: Camping El Sur Very well maintained, clean and friendly. Very nice sanitary facilities and pool. Beautiful pitches. Good starting point to visit Ronda.

title: (29393) Ronda - Carretera de los Molinos
description: Spot below the street.  Accessible via a gravel road that is easy to drive on.  Enough space for 3-4 vans or mobile homes.  The view of the mountains with is also very nice.  There's a bit of junk lying around..

title: (29400) Ronda - Ctra. de los Molinos
description: Good spot to park your van, stay the night and walk down to the bridge. the road further to the bridge get narrow and the first park pretty steep.

title: (29400) Ronda - A-369
description: Nice parking with view to Ronda and mountains around. Possible for overnight or for short stopover. About 2km far from Ronda center.

title: (29400) Ronda - Unnamed Road
description: A small peaceful carpark, the entrance is quite rough at the moment. It has a large recreation area with several picnic tables and a walking route or two.

title: (29400) Ronda - 205 Partida Rosalejo
description: Nice point on the slipping in the car

title: (29400) Ronda - 183 Partida Rosalejo
description: Dirt road adjacent to the provincial road, very quiet as a stop but we didn't spend the night there. Nice view of the hinterland.

title: (29400) Ronda - 1158 Lugar Partido Rural Sancho Jaen
title_short: (29400) Ronda - 1158 Lugar Partido Rural Sancho Jaen
description: Nice place next to a gravel road just before the level crossing. There is a small stream with a bathing area. We stayed here for one night and didn't feel like we were bothering anyone. Trains practically never run and cars passed about 5 that evening.

title: (29400) Ronda - unnamed road
description: Hiking car park with picnic area.

title: (29350) Arriate -
description: Parking at the Arriate train station. we spent the night quietly.

title: (29400) Ronda - 69 Lugar Partido Rural Santa Maria
title_short: (29400) Ronda - 69 Lugar Partido Rural Santa Maria
description: Gas station with a rest area a bit dirty because of people who throw garbage bags there, we spent a night with only one truck driver, little traveled road 10 minutes from Ronda and Setenil,

title: (29350) Arriate - 30 Calle Viñilla
description: Fairly flat parking suitable for camper and small motorhomes. Central

title: (29400) Ronda - 7 Partida los Villalones
description: creek and bridges

title: (29400) Rosalejo - a 369
description: Natural source. No chlorine. You can fill up small canisters. No hose needed.

title: (29370) - 1 Partida Dehesilla
description: Small parking land beaten just above La Cueva del Gato, beautiful spot, road above but not embarrassing. Very nice seen on the mountains. In addition, quiet place!

title: (29360) Montejaque - MA-8403
description: Grass parking lot among the olive trees near Cueva De Hundidero. Nice mountain views near the road but few cars during the day. Good stopover and perfect for walking up to the cave. You are not allowed to go further in, but the 1 hour hike (round trip) to get there is really nice. No service and no waste.

title: (29360) Montejaque - 4 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Parking next to the cemetery of Montejaque. Very quiet and with a couple of areas without light. Perfect to spend the night From here comes a Ferrata

title: (29360) Montejaque - 2 Calle Alcalde Antonio Guzman L
title_short: (29360) Montejaque - 2 Calle Alcalde Antonio Guzman L
description: Ideal parking to spend the night and go on excursions. Call Brigitte and Pedro

title: (29370) Benaoján - 64 Avenida Acceso de la Estacion
title_short: (29370) Benaoján - 64 Avenida Acceso de la Estacion
description: Parking behind the train station, you can also park on the road parallel to the station next to the playground.

title: (29370) Benaoján - 8 Calle Camino Carbenca
description: Parking next to a playground for the elderly, very clean and with a fountain. Very quiet to spend the night.

title: (29370) Benaoján - 6 Avenida Constitucion
description: Drinking water tap. The best in the village according to an inhabitant sky! On the other hand, provide a funnel.

title: (29370) Benaoján - 42 Avenida Acceso de la Estacion
title_short: (29370) Benaoján - 42 Avenida Acceso de la Estacion
description: Fountain at the foot of the road, convenient to fill the tank of the van

title: (29451) Parauta - Carretera de Ronda
description: Gas station lost in the mountains next to a restaurant where you can empty sewage and fill the clean water for free. Free WC by asking the key to the pump attendant. It's behind the car wash to empty the wastewater.

title: (29370) Benaoján - 43 Calle la Linea
description: Spring water and here you can very well stop with the camper. great view of the mountains and the white village.

title: (29451) Parauta - 233 Calle Diego López
description: It is a car park but it is spacious and motorhomes can fit. Ideal to spend a night and take a nearby path. Very quiet area with a children's park, paddle tennis court and padbol and calisthenics park. Nearby is the municipal swimming pool with public services open during the day.

title: (29452) Cartajima - 3 Avenida Fernando VII
description: Superb small car park, separated from the "Restaurante El Mirador del Genal" by the road that leads to the village, stabilized, partially shaded and flat, it is accessible to all sizes.The view of the valley is exceptional.No service but satellite reception and 4G optimal Unfortunately no pictures and I have not spent the night at this place!

title: (29452) Cartajima - 3 Avenida Fernando VII
description: Public drinking water tap

name: AC Gomelez
title: (29394) AC Gomelez
description: Private Monte Finca en pleine nature sans emplacements de camping gratuits. Fermé de 22h00 à 8h00 Contacter parcelle précédemment fermée.

title: (29451) Parauta - Camino de Cajigales
description: Lovely naturalpark with bbq possibilitiy. Water taps (unchecked). Camping not tolerated.

title: (29451) Parauta - unnamed road
description: Potable water, no fillet.

name: Camping Municipal Conejeras
title: () Camping Municipal Conejeras
description: The most authentic mountain type campsite south of Ronda. Beautiful walks in the Sierra de las Nieves and the surrounding white villages.

title: (29370) Benaoján - 22 Partida la Pileta
description: Small free parking along a cul de sac road overlooking the valley. Accessible to all templates, stabilized and overall level, the place is very quiet. No service, 4G very perfectible. Attention in the day and mainly WE, there can be a lot of cars.

title: (29452) Cartajima - Camino del Helechar
description: Large picnic area, level area, with capacity for 8 motorhomes, in the countryside, with rural trails, access is by passable lanes, is about 600 meters from the village of Cartajima, eye with height, the path is surrounded by trees, 3 , 5 m height approx

title: (29462) Júzcar -
description: Esplanade where trails start. Very quiet, only goats and sheep are heard at night.

title: (29460) Alpandeire - MA-7307
description: Parking with great views.

title: (29400) Lifa -
description: Natural terrace at the top of the pass. Magnificent views of Ronda. Access only by van, 4x4 recommended - entrance opposite the car park.

title: (29400) Ronda - A-366
description: Parking in the middle of nature with magnificent views. Along the road but very little traffic over the past 2 nights.

title: (29430) Montecorto -
description: Old ruins which could provide a possible wildcamp if you’re walking or on a bike.

title: (29394) La Cimada -
description: It's a place on the edge of a dirt road to spend a quiet night. There aren't much places in the area, so for 1 night it's perfect. The road is wide enough, the access is easy until this point. There are many possibilities   by this road for any kind of camper. Only a few walkers and cyclist passed by.

title: (29440) Igualeja - Carretera de Ronda
description: Roadside parking lot. But enough to isolate a little in the background. Ideal for vans in this corner where there is nothing to sleep.

name: Acinipo (Roman town, archaeological site)
title: (29400) Acinipo (Roman town, archaeological site)
description: Parking of the Acinipo ruins, the ruins are only open in the morning until 2.30 p.m. We just picnic but I think it is possible to sleep without problems. Parking in the middle of nature. Accessible to motorhomes. Without any service, please leave with your waste.

title: (29460) Alpandeire - 44 Avenida de Andalucia
description: Esplanade at the entrance of the town. Parking area with easy access. We stayed overnight without incident.

title: (29460) Alpandeire - 40 Avenida de Andalucia
description: Below a busy road, at the foot of the Fray Léopoldo de Alpandeire viewpoint, this free car park is 300 meters from the village center. Shaded, stabilized and accessible to all sizes, it offers an exceptional panoramic view of the village and the valley. No services devolved to motorhomes except a water tap, satellite reception and optimal 4G.

title: (29462) Júzcar - Camino a Los Riscos
description: Free space a little above the little-traveled street. Perfect for one night, nice view.

title: (29462) Júzcar - Avenida Havaral
description: A few places nearby for the night. At 150 meters from the village, which is a beautiful village Smurf, worth the visit.

title: (29462) Júzcar - Av. Havaral
description: Siding by the side of the road, under a huge holm oak, with lots of shade. Garbage cans and an untreated water source next to it. We slept a very quiet night, cars passing from 9 in the morning

title: (29462) Júzcar - MA-7303
description: Parking at the roadside at the entrance to juzcar. Little passage at night, good to spend a night there before leaving for hiking or canyoning.

title: (29440) Igualeja - 70 Travesia Pio XII
description: Birth of the Genal river, we have only stopped, I do not know if you can spend the night, it has a picnic area only with benches and playground. Beautiful!

title: (29460) Alpandeire -
description: Drinking water fountain

title: (29460) Alpandeire - 2 Avenida de Andalucia
description: Free parking located behind a café / restaurant closed in low season. Overlooking the village of Alpandeira and the valley, the view is admirable. Accessible to all sizes, stabilized, no service but optimal satellite and 4G reception. Quiet, shaded parking, 300 meters from the center by a pedestrian-only lane. Near the viewpoint of Fray Léopoldo de Alpandeire and a church under construction, the place is recommended for its serenity.

title: () Júzcar - Camino de Pujerra
description: Very large parking in Júzcar.

title: (29440) Igualeja - Unnamed Road
description: Free spot next to the road where you can park and see a beautiful deciduous forest. We visit it in the fall and it is spectacular. Impossible to spend the night for little space, but eating is fine.

title: (29440) Igualeja - 12 Diseminado Poligono 2
description: Space for 2 large vans just off main road at the top of dirt track that leads down to a trail head. Level spot can be found. Fairly quiet with only local village traffic passing by occasionally.

title: (29440) Igualeja -
description: Fairly flat site, near a water reserve and 200 m from a company. beautiful mountain view

title: (29494) Atajate - 8 Calle los Maestros
description: Parking in Atajate. Great esplanade. From the Town Hall they indicated us the casket to fill and the one for emptying the gray. Black cannot be emptied and there is a beautiful route that surrounds the town.

title: (29450) Pujerra -
description: Nice spot next to a river and a calm road. Only 2 houses on the other side of the river. Spent one night. Room for multiple vans.

title: (11692) Setenil de las Bodegas - 22 Calle Cantareria Alta
title_short: (11692) Setenil de las Bodegas - 22 Calle Cantareria Alta
description: Parking at the edge of the road, very difficult to park inside the village. Inside the village, only light cars.

title: (11692) Setenil de las Bodegas -
description: Behind the pavilion, a very quiet area, the security of the place I cannot confirm, but the proximity of the hotel in front, gives some security, there is a source in front of the pavilion with drinking water, but it is not a water supply point for the AC.

title: (11692) Setenil de las Bodegas - 1 Calle Camilo José Cela
title_short: (11692) Setenil de las Bodegas - 1 Calle Camilo José Cela
description: Wild, but still good for quick visit of town.

title: (29392) Barriada de la Estación - 14 Paseo de la Ermita
title_short: (29392) Barriada de la Estación - 14 Paseo de la Ermita
description: River pool in the station neighborhood. It is difficult to get to and you will hardly be able to park, the direct passage is fenced. But well worth a visit on a hot day. There are tables, benches… and shade!

title: (11692) Setenil de las Bodegas -
description: Parking near the football field. It is better to enter the subdivision

title: (11692) Setenil de las Bodegas - 47 Calle Callejón
title_short: (11692) Setenil de las Bodegas - 47 Calle Callejón

title: (11692) Setenil de las Bodegas -
description: Perfect place to spend a night, next to a dirt trail. On Sundays, the occasional cyclist or walker usually passes by. Under a huge top. 2 or 3 vans or 1 or 2 caravans could enter.

title: (11692) Setenil de las Bodegas - CA-414
description: Setenil de las Bodegas station 6 kilometers from the village in the middle of calm and quiet wilderness No service a good alternative to the village where overnight parking is prohibited accessible to any size motorhome

title: (11692) Setenil de las Bodegas - 8A Calle Prolong Reyes Catolicos
title_short: (11692) Setenil de las Bodegas - 8A Calle Prolong Reyes Catolicos

title: (11692) Setenil de las Bodegas - 2 Carretera Setenil Alcala
title_short: (11692) Setenil de las Bodegas - 2 Carretera Setenil Alcala

title: (29392) - 5 Diseminado Poligono 3
description: Jimera de Libar town station area. Nice small area, brand new. Fit about seven motorhomes.  ideal for the routes of the artezuelas, the mills and the plain. There is a shop in the station and a bar. Great for rural tourism. Let’s keep this nice and clean.

title: (11692) Casas Nuevas - 1 Lugar Huerta Higueron
description: Wide street in a residential area on the right as soon as you enter the town.Park for children.Quiet to spend the night

name: Camping Nogalejo
title: (11692) Camping Nogalejo
description: Camping Nogalejo near Setenil de la Bodega. Brand new. Large clean showers, car wash with coins. Large picnic area. Very good restaurant on site.

title: (29430) Montecorto - 2 Arrabal Sup-M
description: Small tap to fill up at the side of the road. No parking but road is quiet to pull over. We filled up here before heading to a nature parking spot.

title: (29430) Montecorto - 4 Plaza Andalucía
description: Large parking lot of land next to a pine forest, rubbish and recycling bins inside the car park, children's playground inside the car park, site very quiet and 2 minutes from the town center on foot, the sun shines.

title: (29400) Ronda - MA-487
description: Full nature breathtaking views of Grazalema Slightly removed from the small road. gravel and grass parking. Quiet night. free no water.

title: (29430) Montecorto - 6 Arrabal Sup
description: Small landing for only 1 vehicle, and quite flat. The parking lot is right in front but it has a lot of unevenness and this place is flat. In the town there are bakeries, cafeterias and sources of drinking water. We had a fairly quiet night.

title: (29392) Jimera de Libar - 14 Diseminado Poligono 2
description: 1km from the village of Jimera de Libar (Sierra Grazalema), quiet picnic area by the river. 1 house just opposite and the railway next to it. by that, no nuisance. Several areas for parking under the trees Swimming authorized and access provided a sign indicates that camping is prohibited

title: (29440) Benahavís - Carretera de Ronda
description: Nice point of view

title: (11610) Grazalema - Unnamed Road
description: Good place.

title: (29430) Montecorto -

title: (29420) El Burgo - 18 A 366
description: Picnic location, very calm. Overnight forbidden.

title: (29420) El Burgo - A-366
description:
Parking next to the street, lots of shade
Spent a quiet night here with no problems

title: (29420) El Burgo - Carril de las Víboras
title_short: (29420) El Burgo - Carril de las Víboras

title: (29440) Igualeja - Cam. de los Anadillos
description: Bulge with a great sea view on a side street that is rarely used. Ideal for one night. Road paved, but quite narrow. Also for larger van vehicles.

title: (29420) El Burgo - Carril de las Víboras
title_short: (29420) El Burgo - Carril de las Víboras
description: Place in nature, on the ridge and near the mirador, splendid panoramic view of the valleys. Accessible by a good track, 2km from the road. Then take a right at the pass, for about 500m of well practicable path. FYI, the viewpoint is visible from the referenced place (watering house).

title: (29430) Montecorto - Unnamed Road
description: Several small pitches for a motorhome on the edge of the path which leads to another spot a little lower. Here, it's flatter, the view is prettier and vehicles that are a bit wide are not scratched by the shrubs that invade the path below... Very quiet site.

title: (29400) Ronda - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet place by the lake, a little steep road to get there. No service. Camping forbidden

title: (29470) Cuevas del Becerro - Paseo del Carrizal
title_short: (29470) Cuevas del Becerro - Paseo del Carrizal
description: Natural water source area with tables, playground, parking, shade.

title: (29493) Benadalid - A-369
description: Mirador de los Castañares. Viewpoint on the road from Juzgar to Gaucin. The ground is not uniform, slight slope. Very quiet to spend the night.

title: (11610) Grazalema - A-2300
description: Mostly quiet stop alongside of the road, looking at the gorgeous lake. We stayed here one night, no problems.

title: (29420) - 25 Partida Fuensanta
description: Picnic and barbecue place, toilets and water. Also for camping. Very calm. Take care of nature. Leave nothing after departure.

title: (11610) Grazalema - 10 CA-9123
description: Air picnic with a fountain of untreated water (source?) Parking starting hiking, alternative to the laundry indicated a little further out of service ..

title: (11610) Grazalema - 3 A-372
description: Grazalema, on the road to the white villages.

title: (11610) Grazalema - 8 A-372

title: (11693) Cádiz - 2 Calle Ramal Cañete B
description: Fairground, new area there are no signs of prohibitions.

title: () Benahavís - Carretera de Ronda

title: (29491) Benalauría - 50 MA-8306

Quiet town where to make some magnificent path (towards Benarraba, Genalguacil and some other town) we have slept and silence Even being at the main entrance is absolute.

title: (11610) Grazalema - 4 Calle Agua

title_short: (11693) Alcalá del Valle - 80 Avenida Caños Santos

title: (29420) El Burgo - Carril de las Víboras
title_short: (29420) El Burgo - Carril de las Víboras
description: Space in the middle of the nature reserve! Gorgeous. Attention path to access it with holes and stones. Accessible by van. Take care of the spot. Important not to leave your waste on site!

title: (29470) Cuevas del Becerro - A-367
description: Rest area parallel to the road, in its old layout, with a fairly flat area and sheltered by a mound. Good view of the town. Good to sleep with hardly any noise from cars. Very quiet place.

description: Free parking in front of a mountain-washing tap country school

title: (29420) El Burgo - Carril de las Víboras

description: In nature. The path is reasonable access. Only for vans.

title: (29420) El Burgo - Camino Cruz Blanca

title: (11687) El Gastor - 11 Calle Alambique

title: (11610) Grazalema - 76 Calle Nueva
description: Quiet place to park, with views of the town the stay was during the week on weekends the same thing changes, please take care of this way of traveling.

name: Camping Tajo Rodillo
title: (11610) Camping Tajo Rodillo
description: Located on the outskirts of Grazalema. With a beautiful view of the mountains. Mainly intended for tents. There are 5 parking spaces for motorhomes. The place has a pool, showers and WiFi.

title: (11610) Grazalema - A-372
description: Two kilometers before Grazalema, shaded car park with a nice view over the village and the Sierra Margarita.

title: (11687) El Gastor - 42 CA-0419
description: Place with tables to eat in the shade of a pine forest. Several hiking trails depart from here. Nice view of the Gastor village.

title: (11611) Villaluenga del Rosario - Calle Albarrada
description: Large flat land at the foot of a cliff with departure of hiking trail. Away from busy roads so absolutely quiet. No service or water.

title: (29679) Benahavís - Carretera de Ronda
description: Lots of space, the street is demarcated by a wall, great view (if clear view) Quiet at night, hardly any cars

title: (29492) Jubrique - 14 Diseminado Bollaco
description: Parking located at the top of the village. Quiet area with water, picnic table and good views. Flat area. It is better to go around the town through the area of the hermitage than to cross it (very steep and narrow slope).

title: (11610) Grazalema - CA-9104
description: Parking to start the Pinsapar track

title: (11610) Grazalema - CA-9104

title: (11611) Villaluenga del Rosario - A-374
description: Villaluenga del Rosario on the road to the white villages. Artisanal cheeses. Potholing.

title: (11610) Grazalema - A-372
description: Small area next to a hiking trail accessible from the road but hidden and well located. Incredible views. The only thing that hiking enthusiasts begin to pass very early.

name: Camping San Juan
title: (29492) Camping San Juan
description: Camping "San Juan" Place to relax and enjoy nature, with lots of native trees, general river at the foot of the campsite ... Very cordial and friendly service. Suggestions: grilled sausage skewer with Quejigo wood ... In male brown bread! For sale San Juan?

title: (11610) Grazalema - A-372
description: Panoramic view. Superb stone and covered picnic tables. About 4 to 5 seats. Prohibited at night.

title: (11687) El Gastor -
description: Not paved, quiet and relatively flat outdoors for max. 5-8 vehicles on a promontory. No shade, no service and no prohibition signs. Satisfactory mobile phone prohibited at night.

title: (11688) El Gastor - Unnamed Road
description: On the side of the road, just a free public fountain source. With the possibility of direct filling of the tank. Poster of the town hall indicating that this water has no sanitary control.

title: (29380) Cortes de la Frontera - 21 Calle Alamos
title_short: (29380) Cortes de la Frontera - 21 Calle Alamos
description: Parking lot. No services. Right in the heart of the village adjacent to the bullfighting ring. Flat level gravel surface. Suitable for small to medium motorhomes but take care as wrong turns can lead to narrow roads making it difficult for larger vans. Good spot to park for the day. Didn’t stay overnight but no prohibition signs. Pretty village. Take note: if parking at the far end away from the entrance there is a bar/pub so there could be noise in the evenings/early hours …you’ve been warned ;)

title: () El Gastor - A-2300
description: Large "shaded" area dedicated to water sports at the end of the lake, open this 17th of April 2017 but gate can be padlocked, several motorhomes, ideal for dogs and very quiet.

title: (11688) Zahara de la Sierra -
description: Just in front of a small amusement park in the middle of nature after the village of Zahara, we spent a very quiet night there. Accessible to large motorhomes.

title: (29410) Yunquera - Calle Castillo
description: Parking in the quiet street and night at the entrance to Yunquera village. Just behind the gas station, which has propane. Very near the beginning of many hiking trails. After the street in the center of Yunquera, with many tapas bars and restaurants on the road that passes through it.

title: (29410) Yunquera - 13 Calle Reyes Catolicos
description: Free parking In the center of town, with some narrow streets for motorhomes. With playground and large esplanada for games with children. In the Sierra de las Nieves.

title: (29380) Cortes de la Frontera - 20 Ciudad Deportiva Nicolás Alonso
title_short: (29380) Cortes de la Frontera - 20 Ciudad Deportiva Nicolás Alonso
description: Parking at the abandoned Hotel Sol y Sierra. Nice park above with a water point. Children's playground nearby. Near center. Access with a large mobile home is only possible from the main road 36.619399, -5.341407 (Passeo de los Acacias).

title: (11690) Olvera - CA-9106
description: Parking with a superb view of Olvera. Picnic tables available and trash cans. Just above the very beautiful Sanctuary Nuestra Seniora de los Remedios, to visit (free), where there are toilets and picnic tables, and an inn opposite. Just below, near the old washhouse, a permanent water point.

title: (29491) Algatocín - A-369
description: A belvedere in the middle of nature, superb view! Small quiet corner at All Saints' Day to spend the night. Parking lot with tables and bins.

title: (11610) Grazalema - A-372
description: Nice vantage point with a fountain. It fits only one car/ small bus/ camper.

title: (29492) Genalguacil - 2 Diseminado el Cerrillar

title: (11688) El Gastor - A-2300

title: (29471) Serrato - 37 Calle Caminillo
description: Parking in Serrato, a very quiet place ideal for sleeping and hiking through the Sierra de las Nieves as well as a wonderful place to climb.

title: (11693) Alcalá del Valle -
description:
Esplanade of Caños Santos (Alcalá del Valle), isolated and supportive, easily accessible and fairly level. Pure tranquility for those who seek to get away from everyday noise. Some weekends they come from the surroundings to visit the convent and stay for a picnic, but few. Please, let's take care of these beautiful places by taking our garbage with us!!

Starting point for mountain bike excursions. Lots of tracks.

title: (29679) Benahavís - A-397
description: Parking on a relatively busy road. Great view but also street noise.

title: (11690) Olvera - 140 Terreno Sau

title: (29109) Tolox - Carril de Tolox a Golondrina
title_short: (29109) Tolox - Carril de Tolox a Golondrina
description: Small promontory (only 3 vehicles) flat with a beautiful view of the valley. Road very little busy. Just above the football field. No water on site but there is a little lower. Close to hiking trails

title: (11690) Olvera - 61 Avenida Manuel de Falla
description: Online parking to visit Olvera.

title: (11688) El Gastor - A-2300
description:
Small parking for a discreet place down the road. Here also beautiful views of the lake. It must be recognized that sloping access is not necessarily within the reach of the campsite owner who fears for his machine. My truck, 7m, went well.
Forbidden to stay for the night.

title: (29490) - 27 Diseminado Poligono 1
description: Quiet place to have lunch next to the deep stream, you can also cool off in a small pool, leaving the paved path to the right is the footbridge path about 4 or 5 km of very easy path for all audiences.

title: (29420) El Burgo - MA-5400
description: Nice place with good views, at the foot of a very quiet road, perfect for overnight in full nature.
